job_title: Finance Assistant in Ellicott City, MD
pros: Conducive working environment with great opportunties

You have the opportunity to make a significant positive impact on the lives of lots of students and you have the opportunity to develop professionally, and to learn uncommon languages such as Dari and Pashto.
cons: The leadership is incompetent. Many (though not all) of the people in leadership positions are discriminatory, and instead of working to train, encourage and develop their staff they discriminate, suppress and inhibit people to be sure that their positions are secure.
